title: Gather the Broken Gear
summary: Jed needs three busted devices rounded up before he can start repairs.
description: Track down the broken projector from Schoolteacher Kasey, Maddie's industrial coffee grinder, and Ellie's arcade display. Once you have all three, return to Jed so he can start patching them up.
flavor: Half the town runs on Jed's tinkering - time to feed his backlog.

stages.title: Round Up the Repairs
stages.description: Collect each broken device so Jed can get them back in working order.

tasks.text: Talk to Jed once you have all three busted devices.

stages.title: Patch the Gear
stages.description: Work with Jed to get the broken gear back in shape.

tasks.text: Check in with Jed after the repairs tutorial.

stages.title: Return the Repaired Items
stages.description: Return the repaired items to their respective owners.

tasks.text: Return the repaired projector to Schoolteacher Kasey.
Return the repaired coffee grinder to Maddie.
Return the repaired arcade display to Ellie.

title: Talk to Jed
summary: Ollie needs you to check in with Jed before the mentor locks up for the night.
description: Ollie flagged you down on the Main Road and reminded you that Jed hates waiting. Hustle down to Jed's stall, let him know you're back from scavenging, and see what he needs.
flavor: Jed's temper is shorter than the daylight on Rusthavenâ€”better not keep him stewing.

stages.title: Hustle to Jed
stages.description: Get off the Main Road and into Jed's Scrap & Salvage before he shutters for shift change.

tasks.text: Head south from the Main Road toward the Town Square.
Find Jed's Scrap & Salvage stall in the market strip.
Touch Jed's name and choose Talk to check in with him.

title: The Stellarium Signal
summary: Jed has detected an energy surge pulsing from the Stellarium Mine.
description: Jed's jury-rigged scanners picked up an anomalous signal deep in the Stellarium Mine. He needs you to track it down and bring back whatever is broadcasting it.
flavor: Mines like that never stay quiet once the dark starts humming.

stages.title: Investigate the Mine
stages.description: Follow Jed's lead into the Stellarium Mine.

stages.title: Into the Dark
stages.description: Bring the mine's systems back online.

tasks.text: Find a way to light up the mine.

stages.title: Delving Deeper
stages.description: Track the resonant signal deeper underground.

tasks.text: Find the source of the energy signal.

stages.title: Heart of the Nest
stages.description: Break through whatever is roosting around the signal source.

stages.title: The Prize
stages.description: Secure the power source and report back.

tasks.text: Return to Jed with the energy core.
Talk to Jed at the shop.
